flowers.name: Rose
flowers.description: Roses are a classic symbol of love and romance. These red roses are perfect for any special occasion.

flowers.name: Tulip
flowers.description: Tulips are elegant flowers that come in a variety of vibrant colors. These pink tulips are a perfect gift for spring.

flowers.name: Lily
flowers.description: Lilies are known for their beautiful fragrance and delicate petals. They are perfect for adding elegance to any setting.

flowers.name: Sunflower
flowers.description: Sunflowers are known for their bright yellow petals and their association with positivity and happiness.

flowers.name: Orchid
flowers.description: Orchids are exotic and unique flowers that symbolize beauty, strength, and love. A perfect addition to any home.

flowers.name: Daisy
flowers.description: Daisies are simple, yet stunning flowers that represent purity and new beginnings.

flowers.name: Lavender
flowers.description: Lavender is not only beautiful but also has a calming fragrance. Itâ€™s perfect for aromatherapy and relaxation.

flowers.name: Chrysanthemum
flowers.description: Chrysanthemums are vibrant, cheerful flowers that symbolize joy and positivity. Great for any celebration.

flowers.name: Peony
flowers.description: Peonies are soft, romantic flowers that symbolize prosperity, good fortune, and a happy marriage.

flowers.name: Carnation
flowers.description: Carnations are beautiful and long-lasting flowers, often associated with admiration and love.

flowers.name: Violet
flowers.description: Violets are delicate flowers that symbolize modesty, loyalty, and love.

flowers.name: Magnolia
flowers.description: Magnolias are elegant flowers that represent strength, perseverance, and beauty.

flowers.name: Geranium
flowers.description: Geraniums are bright, vibrant flowers that are easy to care for and add color to any garden.

flowers.name: Zinnia
flowers.description: Zinnias are bold and colorful flowers that symbolize endurance and a positive attitude.

flowers.name: Marigold
flowers.description: Marigolds are bright, cheerful flowers known for their strong, vibrant colors and symbolism of love and passion.
